body_html: @ezyang thanks for your help. I think it is because that I used to install old caffe2. The old caffe2 libcaffe2.so, libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.so, libcaffe2_gpu.so, libcaffe2_module_test_dynamic.so, libcaffe2_observers.so is in /usr/local/lib, but now new installed caffe2 they all in pytorch/build/lib. I delete all in /usr/local/lib. Now it seems OK. do you think my approach is correct? thanks!
body_text: @ezyang  thanks for your help. I think it is because that I used to install old caffe2.  The old caffe2 libcaffe2.so, libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.so, libcaffe2_gpu.so, libcaffe2_module_test_dynamic.so, libcaffe2_observers.so is in /usr/local/lib, but now new installed caffe2 they all in pytorch/build/lib. body: @ezyang  thanks for your help. I think it is because that I used to install old caffe2.  The old caffe2 `libcaffe2.so`, `libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.so`,` libcaffe2_gpu.so`, `libcaffe2_module_test_dynamic.so`, `libcaffe2_observers.so` is in `/usr/local/lib`, but now new installed caffe2 they all in `pytorch/build/lib`. I delete all in  `/usr/local/lib`. Now it seems OK. do you think my approach is correct? thanks!
